prompts: Create a digital Pokemon with a geometric design and vibrant colors.
Imagine a robot-like creature that can adapt to various environments with sleek features.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of technology and innovation.
Generate a Pokemon with fascinating angular shapes and a mix of cool colors.
Design a quirky creature that represents the fusion of nature and technology.
Make an electric-type Pokemon with a unique crystalline appearance and sharp edges.
Give me a futuristic Pokemon that has a digital or pixelated vibe.
